message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $100 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product, but I was hoping to keep my budget under $90. Would you consider reducing the price?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I can come down to $95.  It's a fair price considering the quality of the product. What do you think?
